haxe.Stack

type
class
Get informations about the call stack.

Static Methods

public callStack() : Array<StackItem>

Return the call stack elements.

public exceptionStack() : Array<StackItem>

Return the exception stack : this is the stack elements between the place the last exception was thrown and the place it was catched.

private itemToString(b : StringBuf, s : StackItem) : Void

private makeStack(s : String) : Array<StackItem>

public toString(stack : Array<StackItem>) : String

Returns a representation of the stack as a printable string.
